name: A Week With Winston
description:
What is A Week with Winston? A Week with Winston is a Five Nights at Freddy's fan game based off the youtuber/twitch streamer "W1nst0n". Plot In this game you play as Winston, after overworking yourself for months your Channel literally comes to attack you.

yay story plot..

Gameplay The gameplay is basically the same as Five Nights at Freddy's, shut the doors, watch the cameras, conserve power, rinse, repeat. How to Play Use your mouse to move your view left or right, clicking the buttons next to the doorways will shut the door or turn the lights on. Moving your cursor onto the "Camera" button will open the cameras, pressing the buttons on the map with change the camera. For information on how to fight against the Winston's, Listen to the Nightly messages from your subconscious (or press the "How to Play" button on the Main Menu if you're playing the demo).
